title: SnowSQL release notes for 2024 | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This article contains the release notes for the SnowSQL, including the following when applicable:
For release note information for versions released prior to January 2022, see the Client Release History.
Fixed an issue with the snowsql --version command failing when automatic upgrades are disabled (noup=False).
The SnowSQL 1.3.0 release disabled automatic upgrades. To use this version, please download and reinstall SnowSQL 1.3.0. Going forward, you must manually install new versions of SnowSQL.
Disabled automatic updates to fix an issue where expired S3 licenses caused SnowSQL to fail.
Fixed an issue where the lack of permission to create log directory aborted SnowSQL.
Fixed an issue that endpoint is not created correctly when connecting to China deployment.
Bumped the keyring dependency to 23.1.0 to address a security vulnerability.
